mapper.select: select a.imgb_no, a.imgb_title, b.m_name, c.pd_num, to_char(imgb_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as imgb_date from img_board a inner join member b on a.m_num = b.m_num inner join product c on a.pd_num = c.pd_num order by imgb_no desc

select a.imgb_no, a.imgb_title, a.imgb_content, b.m_name, c.pd_num, to_char(imgb_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as imgb_date from img_board a inner join member b on a.m_num = b.m_num inner join product c on a.pd_num = c.pd_num order by imgb_no desc
select nvl((select 1 from img_board where imgb_no=#{imgb_no} and imgb_pwd=#{imgb_pwd}),0) as state from dual
SELECT imgb_no,imgb_title,m_name,IMGB_IMG1,IMGB_CNT FROM( select ROWNUM as RNUM,imgb_no,imgb_title,m_name,IMGB_IMG1,IMGB_CNT from foto_view )WHERE RNUM between 1 and 12
